credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Herman Miller Summer Picnic, July 25, 1987
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
description: On white background, a random arrangement of six different-colored ice-creams on  sticks in red, orange, and violet, wrapped in white paper patterned with hearts the color of the ice-cream inside, and inscribed with the words, "july 25, 1987 herman miller summer picnic".
name: Poster
